text.div: <table xmlns="urn:hl7-org:v3" xmlns:npfitlc="NPFIT:HL7:Localisation"> <tbody> <tr> <th>Permission to view outcome</th> <td>Permission to view obtained</td> </tr> <tr> <th>Date obtained</th> <td>19-May-2011, 20:00</td> </tr> <tr> <th>Date expires</th> <td>26-May-2011, 20:00</td> </tr> </tbody> </table>
<content xmlns="urn:hl7-org:v3" xmlns:npfitlc="NPFIT:HL7:Localisation">Patient has an insect bite.</content>

<xml-fragment xmlns:npfitlc="NPFIT:HL7:Localisation"> <urn:content styleCode="bold" xmlns:urn="urn:hl7-org:v3">Disposition:</urn:content> <urn:br xmlns:urn="urn:hl7-org:v3"/> <urn:content xmlns:urn="urn:hl7-org:v3">Go to the nearest Emergency Department within 4 hours. </urn:content> <urn:br xmlns:urn="urn:hl7-org:v3"/> <urn:content styleCode="bold" xmlns:urn="urn:hl7-org:v3">Selected care service:</urn:content> <urn:br xmlns:urn="urn:hl7-org:v3"/> <urn:content xmlns:urn="urn:hl7-org:v3">Dx009</urn:content> <urn:br xmlns:urn="urn:hl7-org:v3"/> <urn:content styleCode="bold" xmlns:urn="urn:hl7-org:v3">Pathways Assessment:</urn:content> <urn:br xmlns:urn="urn:hl7-org:v3"/> <urn:content xmlns:urn="urn:hl7-org:v3">An injury or other health problem was described. <urn:br/>The individual was described as breathing and conscious. <urn:br/>Loss of at least a mugful of blood in the last 30 minutes was not described. <urn:br/>An illness or other health problem was described. - Insect Bite <urn:br/>Fighting for breath was not described. <urn:br/>A heart attack, chest/upper back pain, recent probable stroke, recent fit/seizure or suicide attempt was not described as the main call reason. <urn:br/>New confusion, a diabetic hypo, a probable allergic reaction or successful resuscitation was not described as being the main call reason. <urn:br/>The individual was described as being warm to touch. <urn:br/>An insect or spider bite or sting was described. - Tick Bite <urn:br/>A sting/bite occurring within the last hour was not described. <urn:br/>10 or more stings were not described. <urn:br/>Nausea or vomiting since the sting was not described. <urn:br/>A sting involving the eyes or mouth was not described. <urn:br/>A fever was not described. <urn:br/>An insect still attached to the skin was described. <urn:br/>A tick bite was described. <urn:br/> </urn:content> <urn:content styleCode="bold" xmlns:urn="urn:hl7-org:v3">Advice given:</urn:content> <urn:br xmlns:urn="urn:hl7-org:v3"/> <urn:content xmlns:urn="urn:hl7-org:v3">Remove any jewellery or tight clothing from the area. <urn:br/>Antihistamine medication and creams help reduce swelling and itching. They can be bought from pharmacies. Talk to the pharmacist for advice. Follow the instructions in the pack. <urn:br/>Unless advised not to, or they have already been given, paracetamol or ibuprofen can be used to relieve pain. Follow the instructions in the pack. If in doubt ask a pharmacist. </urn:content> </xml-fragment>
<content xmlns="urn:hl7-org:v3" xmlns:npfitlc="NPFIT:HL7:Localisation">Patient has history of violence towards health care professionals </content>

<content xmlns="urn:hl7-org:v3" xmlns:npfitlc="NPFIT:HL7:Localisation"> Date/Time: 01 June 2017 14:00 Location: CENTRAL LONDON COMMUNITY HEALTHCARE NHS TRUST Psychiatric Community Care Service </content>
